segment.source: To configure your environment for the Microsoft Application Virtualization (App-V) Sequencer, you need to perform certain tasks.
segment.target: To configure your environment for the Microsoft Application Virtualization (App-V) Sequencer, you need to perform certain tasks.

segment.source: Click any link in the following section for information about configuring your environment for running the Sequencer.
segment.target: Click any link in the following section for information about configuring your environment for running the Sequencer.

segment.source: Contains the steps for installing the App-V Sequencer.
segment.target: Contains the steps for installing the App-V Sequencer.

segment.source: How to Create the Package Root Directory
segment.target: How to Create the Package Root Directory

segment.source: Contains the steps necessary to configure the directory where sequenced applications will be installed.
segment.target: Contains the steps necessary to configure the directory where sequenced applications will be installed.

segment.source: How to Modify the Location of the Log Directory
segment.target: How to Modify the Location of the Log Directory

segment.source: Contains the steps necessary to configure where the Sequencer logs will be saved.
segment.target: Contains the steps necessary to configure where the Sequencer logs will be saved.

segment.source: How to Modify the Location of the Scratch Directory
segment.target: How to Modify the Location of the Scratch Directory

segment.source: Contains the steps necessary to configure the location where the Sequencer temporarily stores files during sequencing.
segment.target: Contains the steps necessary to configure the location where the Sequencer temporarily stores files during sequencing.
